Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats on the win, <MYNAME>! Man, it's like
you're on a whole 'nother level!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm still gonna be the world's greatest farmer
someday, though. You're gonna be a tough rival
to beat!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm...Oh, hey <MYNAME>! Congrats on the
win. Hrm? I look worried?
<PAGE>
Nah, I'm not really worried. I was just thinkin'
how you're wasted on a guy like me.
<PAGE>
Folks have sometimes told me you're way outta
my league, and after seeing how you won today,
it's hard to dispute it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Guess I'm gonna have to work harder to be a
guy who can stand tall beside you. I'll do it, too!
Just you watch!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great job, <MYNAME>. Congrats on the win!
<PAGE>
You worked really hard for this every day, so it
was no surprise when I heard 'em call your
name.
<PAGE>
I'm gonna have to take a page from your book
and start really puttin' my nose to the
grindstone.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great job, <MYNAME>. Today sure was a lot of
fun, wasn't it?
<PAGE>
Results are important, yeah, but it's just as
important to remember to have fun! I'm already
lookin' forward to next time! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great job, <MYNAME>. Hn? You look kinda
down. Is it 'cause you didn't win?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It's not like this is the last contest ever, y'know.
The important thing is to have fun, so you leave
with a smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But if you're really, really sad, I'll fling my arms
wide open so you can jump into 'em for a big
consolation hug!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>W-wait, why are you laughing? I really meant it!
Oh well...looks like you've cheered up, and that's
what's important.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great job, <MYNAME>. Hmm? Are you
depressed you didn't win?
<PAGE>
Yeah, losing sucks, no way around that. But I
know way better than those judges, or anybody,
just how hard you tried.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You're one of those types, y'know? Those
uhh...whatchacallit...late boomers? It's those
kinds of people who get good later on!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Huh? The way I said it makes it sound like a kind
of firework? Well, sorry I can't rattle off a turn of
phrase! Hey...you can stop laughing now!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woohoo! I did it! I won! Now I'm one step -- no,
a hundred steps! -- closer to my goal of being
the world's greatest farmer! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, I did it! I won! So yeah, remember
how I told you that, if I won, there was
something important I was gonna tell you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>What? You don't remember? Didn't I mention it
to you when I was over at your place last night?
<PAGE>
You never saw me last night? Wait, was that all
just a dream?! Arrrrgh! My plans! All my plans!
N-no...it's nothing at all... Dang it.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woohoo! I won! Heh heh heh! It's only right that
I get to show off how awesome a husband I am
every now and then. ♪
<PAGE>
Oh, I know! How about we have a big dinner
tonight? It'll be a first-rate celebration!
Hmm...what do I wanna make?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Dang it, I was really confident I'd win this time.
Just what about my entry wasn't good enough?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh well. The past is the past. I'll just have to win
next time!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Dang it! My plan to show off how awesome I
can be by winning today and then making you
fall for me even more is ruined!
<PAGE>
Everything played out perfectly in my head, too,
but none of it works if I don't actually win!
Arrrrrgh.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y'know, I've been thinking lately that it'd be kinda
cool if we could both become the world's
greatest farmers together.
<PAGE>
It stinks that I lost. If it'd been to you, I could've
lived with it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But I can't stand losing to someone else!
And I really, really don't wanna see you lose to
anybody else, either!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So my new idea is for us both to finish first and
second every time from now on! It'd be nice if
we could take turns winning, too.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Every time I raise some really good produce, I
always have to think really hard if I wanna ship
it, or if I just wanna eat it myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I mean, the better it looks, the more you want to
taste it for yourself, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But if I ate it, then I wouldn't be able to use it as
my entry in the festival...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>To be honest, the biggest challenge isn't beating
the other entrants, it's controlling my own
appetite.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't really like flowers much. I mean, no
matter how hard you work to raise 'em, you
can't eat them in the end.
<PAGE>
Though if there was some kind of edible flower
out there, I'll bet I could learn to like it.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fruit is great! It may take a really long time for
the trees to grow, but once they do, a whole
bunch of fruit'll ripen at once.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>See, sometimes I forget to do stuff like watering
some of my crops, so having fruit trees that
don't need it is a big help! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Most other crops you can find a way to raise on
your own, but for stuff like rice and lotus roots,
you've gotta have a paddy or else it's a no-go.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>So that means having a paddy can really shake
up the kinds of produce you're able to ship.
<PAGE>
Y'know...if you think of it that way, our whole
farming strategies really begin with the kinds of
fields we do and don't have.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. Your produce
looked quite impressive. Unsurprising, given
your skill as a farmer.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Since you worked so hard, I think it's only fair
that, as your significant other, I give you a
reward. Think of something you'd like, okay?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done, <MYNAME>. Your unflagging effort
has now borne fruit.
<PAGE>
I'm very proud of you. We should have a
celebration this evening.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. You may not have won,
but do not let it get to you too much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Effort always pays off - if not now, then in the
future. Just think of this as preparation for next
time's victory.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. You gave it your best. If
you want to take your mind off things, perhaps
we can stop by somewhere on the way home.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. It's unfortunate you
didn't win, but you gave a rousing effort.
<PAGE>
Is there anything you'd like for dinner tonight? I'll
make whatever you're in the mood for.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>On days like today, there's nothing wrong with
asking for a little pampering. There isn't much
else I could do for you, anyway.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won (Dating)

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Self won (Married)

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self didn't win (Dating)

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win (Married)

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The winning vegetable looked excellent indeed. I
wonder how long it takes to grow something of
that quality.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The fragrance of the flowers still lingers. It is no
wonder each farmer chose to enter the ones
they did. All of them had beautiful scents.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All of the fruits looked so juicy. At first glance, I
would assume freshness had the greatest impact
on the judges. They seemed very intent on it.
<PAGE>
If you were to ship fruits, I'd expect the fresher
they are, the higher a price they would fetch.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Which do you prefer with your breakfast,
<MYNAME>? Bread or rice?
<PAGE>
Er, somehow, an earlier conversation about the
produce in today's contest veered off on a
tangent about breakfast foods.
<PAGE>
If I had to choose one or the other, I'd say I have
rice more often. But it seems most people here
tend toward bread.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, <MYNAME>! You've got this farming
thing down to a science! I'm impressed.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Congrats, <MYNAME>. You've gotta be really ace
to take the win like that. I feel like I'm falling in
love all over again.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats. You really put your all into it today. I'm
glad that came through in the results.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too bad you didn't win today. But don't let it
get'cha down. Remember, there'll always be a
next time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here, <MYNAME>, say "aaaaah." Tastes pretty
good, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That's one of my special, home-made Pick-Me-
Up Sweets. Things didn't turn out how we'd
hoped, but I hope you feel a little better now.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's too bad you didn't win, but I don't think it
was any kinda shortcoming on your part.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know better than anyone just how hard you
work at it.
<PAGE>
This time things didn't turn out how we'd hoped,
but I'm sure we'll be toasting your victory next
time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So don't worry. It's only a matter of time before
your farming wizardry dazzles the judge.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won (Dating)

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Self won (Married)

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self didn't win (Dating)

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win (Married)

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's winning vegetable had some really great
color. I can't see really good produce like that
without wanting to cook it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whenever somebody uses one of my favorite
kinds of flowers as an entry for this contest, I
always find myself fixated on it.
<PAGE>
Flowers, vegetables or even people, I tend to just
surround myself with the ones I like the most. I
guess that means I'd make a pretty bad judge.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seeing the fruit in today's festival gave me a
great idea for a new dessert. Maybe I'll try
making it when I get back home.
<PAGE>
If it goes well, how about you stop by and give
it a try? On the house, since your fruit was one
of the ones that inspired it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For some reason, it looks like there's quite a
debate going on here about whether bread or
rice is better with breakfast.
<PAGE>
Hm? Me? Umm...I guess I'd pick bread. Even
when I'm in a hurry, it's easy to grab a quick
slice.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations on your victory. I am glad that
your daily efforts have earned you recognition.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your victory. However, I hope
you save some of your festive mood for when
the day is done.
<PAGE>
I must admit, I can't help feeling a touch of
pride.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations on your victory. I expected no
less from someone as dedicated as you.
<PAGE>
I knew that with the hard work and tireless effort
you put in, you would undoubtedly stand proud
in the winner's circle.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to you and everyone else, <MYNAME>, I
had a wonderful time today.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Results are important, but they don't tell the full
story. It is unfortunate that you did not win this
time...
<PAGE>
But I am sure you have learned some valuable
lessons from the experience. Do not feel too
disheartened.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Someday, you will benefit from what you
learned today. When that time comes, you will
stand triumphant. Of that I am certain.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. It is unfortunate you
didn't win today.
<PAGE>
But do not let yourself become too disheartened.
Let's just start focusing on next time.
<PAGE>
Let me know if there is anything I can do to
help. I will aid you however I'm able.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won (Dating)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Self won (Married)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self didn't win (Dating)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win (Married)

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Why am I in a foul mood? I am not in a foul
mood. You are imagining things.
<PAGE>
I simply do not have much interest in
vegetables, that is all.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The winning flower had a strange sense of grace
and dignity to it, even though it is merely a
plant.
<PAGE>
It was as if all the tenderness and care with
which it was raised was laid bare for us to see.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Many fruits are full of healthy vitamins, so eating
one will go a long way towards easing fatigue.
<PAGE>
It is said the effect is even more pronounced if
you serve the fruit with honey. Why don't you try
it sometime?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I would think tea brewed from winning leaves
would be on a much higher level than normal
tea, from its fragrance to its taste.
<PAGE>
If the opportunity ever arises, I would like to
taste that difference for myself.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You won? Yeah, I saw. Congrats, you made a
good showin' today.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You won. But then, I knew you could. Great
work.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats on winning. Kinda expected you
would, anyway, but it's nice to see it happen.
<PAGE>
Given how hard you work every day, how could
you lose? I knew you'd win before the contest
even started.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You lost? Yeah, looks like it. No big deal. All
you've gotta do is win next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>What're you staring at me for? Did I say
something weird?
<PAGE>
Just so you know, don't expect any consolation
outta me. If that's what you're looking for, go
ask somebody else.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You okay, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Er, it's nothing. I was just, uh, wondering if you
were feeling down about losing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>N-not like I was gonna try to cheer you up or
anything! I'm not good at that stuff. A-anyway,
I'm just glad you're okay.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Everything's done, right? C'mon, let's get ready
to go.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Is there anything you wanna have for dinner
tonight? Speak up now, I'm takin' requests.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>So uh...ahem...can you, um...cheer up? Please?
It doesn't feel right to see you not smiling.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won (Dating)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Self won (Married)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self didn't win (Dating)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win (Married)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Win or lose, this is still all about vegetables,
right? They all look bad to me.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Whenever I see flowers, I can't help but envision
how I'd use them in landscaping.
<PAGE>
With that sort of flower, I'd lay things out like so,
and plant it over there. Stuff like that. I just can't
stop myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Maybe that's being a "workaholic?" Ah well. I get
to spend all day thinking about stuff I love. I'd
hardly call that a problem.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I wonder when people start growing the fruit we
see in these festivals.
<PAGE>
Given how long it takes for the fruit trees to
grow, I'd guess they have to plan way ahead of
time.
<PAGE>
Coming up with a solid plan that far in advance
and then seeing it through is pretty awesome. I
can respect that kind of dedication.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Knowing fruits and vegetables is one thing, but
this judge knows all about fringe stuff like
flowers and mushrooms, too. That takes skill.
<PAGE>
I like people like that, who really learn every
aspect of their craft. I hope one day I'll have
something I've mastered that completely.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations. Seeing you try so hard today is
inspiring me to work a little harder myself.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you won. That's great! Congratulations,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Looks like I need to step up my game, too.
Maybe when we get home, I'll start
experimenting with new floral arrangements.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. We should
celebrate tonight. What do you want for dinner?
I'll make your favorite.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good job today. Once the excitement of a
contest winds down, the exhaustion tends to hit
you all at once. You should get home and rest.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey <MYNAME>. Good job today. It's too
bad about you not winning and all, but don't let
it get to you.
<PAGE>
Sure, it'd be nice to come home with that blue
ribbon, but at the end of the day...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...I think the most important thing of all is that
you had fun today.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good job today, <MYNAME>. It's too bad you
didn't win, but there's always next time.
<PAGE>
If there's anything I can do to help you prep for
the next contest, just let me know. 
<PAGE>
I love helping you out, no matter what it is. I feel
like I'm always learning something new.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self won (Dating)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Self won (Married)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Self didn't win (Dating)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Self didn't win (Married)

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seeing all those delicious vegetables is making
me want to dig into a big salad right now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>The fact that just looking at them can make
someone hungry is a sign that those vegetables
really were the best of the best.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Out of all the categories in these harvest
festivals, I like the flower contest the best.
<PAGE>
I get to see lots of different kinds of flowers, and
that naturally leads to thinking up arrangements
for them, which is fun, too.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I don't like sweet things very much, but that's
more about sugary-sweet desserts. I'm okay with
the naturally sweet taste of fruits.
<PAGE>
I mean, the fruits entered in today's contest
looked really good to me. I'd love to have a taste.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I have a lot of fun at festivals like these. They
give me a chance to look at produce I wouldn't
usually have the chance to see.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today, you were lucky. However, a win is a win,
so I will politely offer you my congratulations.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. Well done.
<PAGE>
I do not plan on losing to you forever, though. I
will study more about farming and one day, I
shall be the victor. Ohohohoho!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. You were lucky,
today.
<PAGE>
Ohohohoho! I'm just teasing. You won entirely
on your own merit. I see what you do every day,
after all. No one would know that better than I.
<PAGE>
It seems I must study even harder. We may be
married, but I do hope that we will continue to
challenge each other to achieve greatness.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a pity you didn't win. Ah well. Do not lose
heart. All you need to do is try harder next time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a pity you didn't win. But don't lose heart.
<PAGE>
Results can easily be swayed depending on
many factors, such as who your opponents are,
or what vegetables they chose to bring.
<PAGE>
If you allowed yourself to be depressed over
each and every little thing, you'd be a wreck!
Now chin up, and start preparing for next time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. Hm? Are you feeling
down?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It hardly feels right, to see you so down.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, I guess I shall have to do something about
that! Tonight, I'll make your favorite, so cheer
up, okay?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohohohoho! There is no possible reason why my
perfectly raised top-grade vegetables would not
win. This was the obvious conclusion!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, <MYNAME>? Have I not improved?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Even though we are courting now...no,
especially because we are together, I want to be
your number one rival.
<PAGE>
Someday, I want you to acknowledge that I am
the superior farmer. I think that desire is
precisely what helped me win today.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohohohoho! I won!
<PAGE>
I think the day when my farm is acknowledged
as superior to yours may be just around the
corner.
<PAGE>
Do you disagree? Then next time, I suggest you
bring an even better vegetable! Married or not, I
won't go easy on you! ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I still cannot believe I didn't win. Which aspect
of my presentation was not good enough?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I guess there is still much I can improve upon as
a farmer. I confess, this all was a terrible blow to
my confidence.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Rrrgh, how frustrating! How could I not win? I
was so confident this time, too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>That does it! Tonight is comfort food night! A
full three courses! You will be joining me of
course, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Who on earth thought up the ridiculous idea of a
festival for looking at vegetables?
<PAGE>
Ugh! Whoever did it certainly was successful at
creating an unnecessary annoyance, at least.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There truly are lots and LOTS of different
varieties of flowers.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>They're very pleasant to look at, but when forced
to decide which to use as an entry, I always
have the most difficult time deciding.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Seeing all of these lovely fruits has made me
hungry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I think I'll have a tray of fruity snacks at tea time
today.
<PAGE>
Yes, that's an excellent idea. This festival has
been exhausting, so I will leave for home early
and spend the rest of the day in elegant repose.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If someone were to discover the judge's favorite
kind of produce and use that as their entry,
wouldn't they have an unfair advantage?
<PAGE>
After all, if I were the judge, it would be hard for
me NOT to declare my favorite crops the winner
every time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>No, wait. Because I love my favorites so much, I
think I would be much harder on them if they
weren't perfect in every way...
<PAGE>
Hm. I guess that means playing to the judge's
tastes might backfire. And here I thought it was
such a clever idea, too...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You were quite a dashing sight up there on stage
today. Congratulations on your win!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations. You looked so gallant up there
